Book online to receive 10% off
WHAT'S NEXT?
Once we’ve received the deposit, we’ll order any required materials and confirm your appointment via email. If materials or availability result in us not being able to meet your requested appointment date, we’ll be in touch to find a day and time frame that suits you best.
ON THE DAY
As soon as the work is finished, you’ll be asked for a signature to confirm you’re happy with the work and the final cost. Your operative will either process payment with you on site or will send you a payment request via email.
The remaining balance will be taken from the last card you provided us with. If you wish to amend your card details, please get in touch through the support link in this email.
Should there be any problems on the day, e.g. we can’t gain access to your property, or the tradesperson’s held up, we’ll inform you straight away.
HOW WE CHARGE
For pre-defined fixed-price jobs, we charge the rate quoted. They are designed to take into account the investigation of the required works, trusted trade knowledge, trade accredited body requirements, and any registrations that we must undertake.
There’ll be no extra charges for parts, materials or collections. In case the works take less or more time than calculated for, the charge to you will remain the same.
If we have to amend the scope of work, we’ll reach out to you to discuss any change in costs before proceeding. For more information read our terms and conditions.
OUR CANCELLATION POLICY
If you want to cancel your booking once we’ve allocated a tradesperson, you may be charged a cancellation fee. For more information please check our cancellation policy.
